BARBUSS ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF
HDI SEGUROS IN ARGENTINA AND URUGUAY
 
 
Buenos Aires, Montevideo, August 6, 2025 – BARBUSS, a global company with over two decades of experience in the risk industry, announces the acquisition of HDI Seguros’ operations in Argentina and Uruguay. Both companies are now owned by BARBUSS, with the exception of a 10% stake in HDI Seguros Uruguay that remains the property of Talanx AG. The closing of this part of the transaction, which is subject to regulatory procedures, is expected to occur in 2025.

BARBUSS ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF
HDI SEGUROS IN ARGENTINA AND URUGUAY
 
 
Buenos Aires, Montevideo, August 6, 2025 – BARBUSS, a global company with over two decades of experience in the risk industry, announces the acquisition of HDI Seguros’ operations in Argentina and Uruguay. Both companies are now owned by BARBUSS, with the exception of a 10% stake in HDI Seguros Uruguay that remains the property of Talanx AG. The closing of this part of the transaction, which is subject to regulatory procedures, is expected to occur in 2025.

At BARBUSS, our vision is to transform the risk industry. We are driven by our purpose: to improve risk industry risk industry through innovation and collaboration.

"Aligned with our purpose of being collaborative with our clients to achieve common goals and our strategy of incorporating more  acculturated talent, we are making this acquisition and welcoming the HDI Argentina and Uruguay teams," said Mauro Arcucci, CEO of BARBUSS.

Currently, both companies are working together to complete the regulatory formalities required in each jurisdiction, with the goal of ensuring a smooth and successful transition.

Currently, both companies are working together to complete the regulatory formalities required in each jurisdiction, with the goal of ensuring a smooth and successful transition.
